subject: White elastomer set
description_text:
Hello,

I recently purchased a set of pro plus pedals and am emailing to inquire
into how to get a set of the soft, white elastomers for the brake pedal.

I looked on the website but did not see the ability to purchase them.

Thank you,
Colton

*Colton Barnes*
(606) 275-2150

*Confidentiality Notice*
This message and/or attachment is intended only for the addressee and may
contain information that is privileged, confidential and/or proprietary
work product. If you are not the intended recipient, or an authorized
employee, agent or representative of the intended recipient, do not read,
copy, retain or disseminate this message or any attachment. Do not forward
this message and attachment without the express written consent of the
sender. If you have received this message in error, please contact the
sender immediately and delete all copies of the message and any attachment.
Transmission or misdelivery shall not constitute waiver of any applicable
legal privilege.

conversations.body_text: Hi Colton Barnes,    You can make your purchase at this link.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/elastomer
